# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

1. INTAL HAS IN PAST MADE RELATIVELY LITTLE IMPACT IN BOLIVIA.
IT HAS HELD THREE SEMINARS IN BOLIVIA, THE LAST MORE THAN TWO
YEARS AGO.


2. NOW BOLIVIAN INTEGRATION OFFICIALS HAVE RECENTLY CONTACTED
INTAL AND BELIEVE IT WILL BE ABLE TO OFFER TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE,
ESPECIALLY ON CURRICULUM, FOR PROPOSED LA PAZ-BASED INSTITUTO
INTERNACIONAL DE INTEGRACION, AN ANDEAN INTEGRATION INSTITUTE
WHICH ANDRES BELLO CONGRESS RECENTLY APPROVED IN PRINCIPLE.


3. BOLIVIAN OFFICIALS STATE THAT THEY FORESEE PROPOSED IN-
STITUTE AND INTAL AS COMPLEMENTARY, NOT COMPETITIVE. INITIALLY,






 161613Z


BOLIVIANS WILL BE SEEKING FUNDING FOR NEW INSTITUTE FROM PRIVATE




                     

                  

FOUNDATIONS.
STEDMAN
